1.name: Grease
1.description: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

2.name: The Deer Hunter
2.description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

3.name: National Lampoon's Animal House
3.description: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

4.name: Superman
4.description: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

5.name: Halloween
5.description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

6.name: Pretty Baby
6.description: A teenage girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

7.name: Midnight Express
7.description: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

8.name: Every Which Way but Loose
8.description: The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.

9.name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
9.description: When seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade a small town, replicating the residents one body at a time.

10.name: Day of the Woman
10.description: An aspiring writer is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by four men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

11.name: Days of Heaven
11.description: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

12.name: The Boys from Brazil
12.description: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

13.name: Convoy
13.description: Truckers form a mile long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff...Based on the country song of same title by C.W. McCall.

14.name: Coming Home
14.description: A woman whose husband is fighting in Vietnam falls in love with another man who suffered a paralyzing combat injury there.

15.name: Interiors
15.description: Three sisters find their lives spinning out of control in the wake of their parents' sudden, unexpected divorce.

16.name: The Lord of the Rings
16.description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

17.name: Dawn of the Dead
17.description: Following an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia S.W.A.T. team members, a traffic reporter, and his television executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

18.name: Starcrash
18.description: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.

19.name: Death on the Nile
19.description: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

20.name: Jaws 2
20.description: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

21.name: The Fury
21.description: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from terrorists, who want to use his mental powers for evil.

22.name: Up in Smoke
22.description: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

23.name: Quel maledetto treno blindato
23.description: In 1944 France, a group of escaped American military prisoners en route to Switzerland volunteers to steal a Nazi V2 rocket warhead for the Allies.

24.name: Watership Down
24.description: A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.

25.name: Heaven Can Wait
25.description: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

26.name: The Wiz
26.description: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

27.name: Piranha
27.description: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

28.name: Damien: Omen II
28.description: Damien the Antichrist, now about to turn thirteen years old, finally learns of his destiny under the guidance of an unholy disciple of Satan. Meanwhile dark forces begin to eliminate all those who suspect the child's true identity.

29.name: Coma
29.description: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

30.name: Game of Death
30.description: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

31.name: The Wild Geese
31.description: A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.

32.name: The First Great Train Robbery
32.description: In Victorian England, a master criminal makes elaborate plans to steal a shipment of gold from a moving train.

33.name: Battlestar Galactica
33.description: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet in a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

34.name: La montagna del dio cannibale
34.description: A girl and her brother fly to New Guinea to look for a lost expedition, led by her husband, which has vanished in the great jungle.

35.name: Magic
35.description: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy while he tries to renew a romance with his high school sweetheart.

36.name: Höstsonaten
36.description: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.

37.name: The Driver
37.description: A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

38.name: Goin' South
38.description: Due to the lack of men after the Civil War, a small western town allows a bachelorette with ulterior motives to save a horse thief from the gallows by marrying him. They must deal with his old gang, the Sheriff, the bank, and each other.

39.name: The Cat and the Canary
39.description: A group of potential heirs gather in a forbidding old house to learn which of them will inherit a fortune. Later, they learn that a flesh-rending maniac is loose.

40.name: Corvette Summer
40.description: A high school grad and a hooker-in-training try to track down his stolen Corvette.

41.name: Zui quan
41.description: Wong Fei-Hung (Jackie Chan) is a mischievous, yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents, his frustrated father has him disciplined by Beggar So (Siu Tin Yuen), a Master of drunken martial arts.

42.name: Foul Play
42.description: A shy San Francisco librarian and a bumbling cop fall in love as they solve a crime involving albinos, dwarves, and the Catholic Church.

43.name: Deathsport
43.description: Futuristic Science Fiction about a sport to the death, using "destructocycles".

44.name: Return from Witch Mountain
44.description: Tia and Tony visit Los Angeles, but he's quickly kidnapped by an evil scientist, leaving her to desperately search for him.

45.name: Paradise Alley
45.description: Three Italian-American brothers, living in the slums of 1940's New York City, try to help each other with one's wrestling career using one brother's promotional skills and another brother's con-artist tactics to thwart a sleazy manager.

46.name: Force 10 from Navarone
46.description: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

47.name: Felicity
47.description: Teenager Felicity studies at a remote Roman Catholic Church boarding school and seeks indulgence in popular erotic novels Story of O, Emmanuelle and in a lesbian love affair with her friend Jenny.

48.name: The Buddy Holly Story
48.description: The story of the life and career of the early rock and roll singer, from his meteoric rise to stardom, to his marriage and untimely death.

49.name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
49.description: Small town band hits it big, but they must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

50.name: The Cat from Outer Space
50.description: Three scientists help an Alien feline, stranded on Earth, to repair its damaged spacecraft in order to return home but their efforts are hampered by inept army officials and foreign spies.
